Title: Directs the department of health to establish a right to preventative maintenance of wheelchairs program
Summary: Directs the department of health to establish a right to preventative maintenance of wheelchairs program, after consultation with certain other offices, under which owners of manual and powered wheelchairs shall be entitled to reimbursement of certain preventative maintenance costs for such wheelchairs.
LawCode: Ren Art 32 ยง670 to be Art 32-A ยง676, add ยง677, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to directing the department of health to establish a right to preventative maintenance of wheelchairs program
